hitapu janadhipathi aar.premadasa mahatha wisin"wisumpaya"goda nangana ladde wideshayan gen meratata paminena rajya sambhawaniya amuththan sandaha wuwath wathman aanduwa el.ti.ti.ee nayakayekuta nawathan sapasima sandaha wisumpaya yodagena thibima kanagatuwata karunak bawath maha lekam waraya kiya sitiyi.ke.pi nudaru kalayedi uthure maha amathi wana bawata puwathpath wala wartha pala wana bawa penwa dun ohu koti 20,000 ta adhika el.ti.ti.ee wathkam ha naw hathalis gananak genwana bawata wahasi bas dedu amathiwarun dan kiyanne menawadayi pahadili nowana bawada sandahan kaleya.
